summary.span: 表示 的参数，或者其与 列的映射。

span.span: Represents a parameter to a and optionally its mapping to columns.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。
有关参数的详细信息，请参阅[配置参数和参数数据类型](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types)。

span.span: For more information on parameters, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数名称不区分大小写。Parameter names are not case sensitive. > [!NOTE] > 无名称（也称为序号） .NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持 SQL Server 的参数。Nameless, also called ordinal, parameters are not supported by the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server. 有关详细信息以及演示如何使用参数的其他示例代码，请参阅[命令和参数](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/commands-and-parameters)。For more information, along with additional sample code demonstrating how to use parameters, see [Commands and Parameters](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/commands-and-parameters). ## Examples 下面的示例通过 中的 集合创建多个 实例。The following example creates multiple instances of through the collection within the . 这些参数用于从数据源中选择数据，并将数据放入 中。These parameters are used to select data from the data source and put the data in the . 此示例假设已使用适当的架构、命令和连接创建了 和 。This example assumes that a and a have already been created by using the appropriate schema, commands, and connection. 有关使用参数的详细信息和其他示例，请参阅[在 ADO.NET 中检索和修改数据](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-and-modifying-data)和[配置参数和参数数据类型](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types)。For more information and additional examples on using parameters, see [Retrieving and Modifying Data in ADO.NET](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-and-modifying-data) and [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types). [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你在 `value` 参数中指定 时， 将从 的 Microsoft .NET 框架类型推断而来。When you specify an in the `value` parameter, the is inferred from the Microsoft .NET Framework type of the . 使用 构造函数的此重载来指定整数参数值时，请务必小心。Use caution when you use this overload of the constructor to specify integer parameter values. 因为此重载接受 类型的 `value`，所以当此值为零时，必须将整数值转换为 类型，如下面的 C# 示例所示。Because this overload takes a `value` of type , you must convert the integral value to an type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates. ```csharp Parameter = new SqlParameter("@pname", (object)0); ``` 如果不执行此转换，编译器将假定您尝试调用 构造函数重载。If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler assumes that you are trying to call the constructor overload. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameter.SqlParameter6 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.SqlParameter6 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlParameter.SqlParameter6 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.SqlParameter6 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示参数是仅限输入、仅限输出、双向还是存储过程返回值参数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the parameter is input-only, output-only, bidirectional, or a stored procedure return value parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 输出，并且关联 的执行不返回值，则 包含 null 值。If the is output, and execution of the associated does not return a value, the contains a null value. 在关闭 之前，无法访问通过调用 返回的 `Output`、`InputOut`和 `ReturnValue` 参数。`Output`, `InputOut`, and `ReturnValue` parameters returned by calling cannot be accessed until you close the . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. summary.span: 当使用 Always Encrypted 时强制执行参数的加密。

span.span: Enforces encryption of a parameter when using Always Encrypted.

summary.span: 如果 SQL Server 告知驱动程序参数不需加密，则使用该参数的查询会失败。

span.span: If SQL Server informs the driver that the parameter does not need to be encrypted, the query using the parameter will fail.

summary.span: 此属性提供针对安全攻击的额外保护，这些攻击涉及受损 SQL Server 向客户端提供不正确的加密元数据，这可能会导致数据泄漏。

span.span: This property provides additional protection against security attacks that involve a compromised SQL Server providing incorrect encryption metadata to the client, which may lead to data disclosure.

value.span: 如果参数具有强制列加密，则为 ；否则为 。

summary.span: 获取或设置 属性的偏移量。

span.span: Gets or sets the offset to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Offset` 属性用于二进制和字符串数据的客户端分块。The `Offset` property is used for client-side chunking of binary and string data. 例如，若要在服务器上的列中插入10MB 的文本，用户可能会执行10个1MB 块的参数化插入，将每个迭代上的 `Offset` 的值切换为1MB。For example, in order to insert 10MB of text into a column on a server, a user might execute 10 parameterized inserts of 1MB chunks, shifting the value of `Offset` on each iteration by 1MB. `Offset` 指定二进制类型的字节数，以及字符串的字符数。`Offset` specifies the number of bytes for binary types, and the number of characters for strings. 字符串的计数不包括终止字符。The count for strings does not include the terminating character. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/VB/source.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于表示 属性的最大位数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of digits used to represent the property.

value.span: 用于表示 属性的最大位数。

span.span: The maximum number of digits used to represent the property.

value.span: 这指示数据提供程序将设置 的精度。

span.span: This indicates that the data provider sets the precision for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性由 `Decimal`的参数使用。The property is used by parameters that have a of `Decimal`. 不需要指定输入参数的 和 属性的值，因为可以从参数值推断它们。You do not need to specify values for the and properties for input parameters, as they can be inferred from the parameter value. `Precision` 和 `Scale` 是输出参数所必需的，并且对于需要在不指示值的情况下指定参数的完整元数据的情况，例如，使用特定的精度和小数位数指定 null 值。`Precision` and `Scale` are required for output parameters and for scenarios where you need to specify complete metadata for a parameter without indicating a value, such as specifying a null value with a specific precision and scale. > [!NOTE] > 不支持使用此属性来强制传递到数据库的数据。Use of this property to coerce data passed to the database is not supported. 若要在将数据传递到数据库之前对其进行舍入、截断或强制转换，请先使用 `System` 命名空间的一部分 类，然后再为参数的 `Value` 属性赋值。To round, truncate, or otherwise coerce data before passing it to the database, use the class that is part of the `System` namespace prior to assigning a value to the parameter's `Value` property. > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework 版本1.0 附带 Microsoft .NET 框架数据提供程序不验证 参数值的 或 。Microsoft .NET Framework data providers that are included with the .NET Framework version 1.0 do not verify the or of parameter values. 这可能会导致在数据源中插入截断的数据。This can cause truncated data being inserted at the data source. 如果使用 .NET Framework 版本1.0，请在设置参数值之前验证 值的 和 。If you are using .NET Framework version 1.0, validate the and of values before setting the parameter value. 使用 .NET Framework 版本1.1 或更高版本时，如果使用无效的 设置 参数值，则会引发异常。When you use .NET Framework version 1.1 or a later version, an exception is thrown if a parameter value is set with an invalid . 超出 参数比例 值仍会被截断。 values that exceed the parameter scale are still truncated. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameter.Precision Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.Precision Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlParameter.Precision Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.Precision Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 重置与此 关联的类型。

span.span: Resets the type associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当执行包含参数值的命令时，代码可以显式设置参数的类型，或者该参数可以从其值推断其类型。When executing a command that includes parameter values, code can either set the type of a parameter explicitly, or the parameter can infer its type from its value. 调用此方法将重置参数，使其可以再次从参数中传递的值推断其类型。Calling this method resets the parameter so that it can again infer its type from the value passed in the parameter. 调用此方法会影响 的 和 属性。Calling this method affects both the and properties of the .

summary.span: 获取或设置所解析的 的小数位数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of decimal places to which is resolved.

value.span: 对 进行解析的小数位数。

span.span: The number of decimal places to which is resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性由 `Decimal`、`DateTime2`、`DateTimeOffset`或 `Time`的参数使用。The property is used by parameters that have a of `Decimal`, `DateTime2`, `DateTimeOffset`, or `Time`. > [!WARNING] > 如果未显式指定 属性，并且服务器上的数据不适合 scale 0 （默认值），则可能会截断数据。Data may be truncated if the property is not explicitly specified and the data on the server does not fit in scale 0 (the default). > 对于 `DateTime2` 类型，scale 0 （默认值）将作为 datetime2 （7）传递。For the `DateTime2` type, scale 0 (the default) will be passed as datetime2(7). 目前没有方法发送参数，如 datetime2 （0）。There is currently no way to send a parameter as datetime2(0). 缩放1-7 按预期方式工作。Scales 1-7 work as expected. > 此问题也适用于 `DateTimeOffset` 和 `Time`。This problem applies to `DateTimeOffset` and `Time` as well. 不需要指定输入参数的 和 属性的值，因为可以从参数值推断它们。You do not need to specify values for the and properties for input parameters, as they can be inferred from the parameter value. `Precision` 和 `Scale` 是输出参数所必需的，并且对于需要在不指示值的情况下指定参数的完整元数据的情况，例如，使用特定的精度和小数位数指定 null 值。`Precision` and `Scale` are required for output parameters and for scenarios where you need to specify complete metadata for a parameter without indicating a value, such as specifying a null value with a specific precision and scale. > [!NOTE] > 不支持使用此属性来强制传递到数据库的数据。Use of this property to coerce data passed to the database is not supported. 若要在将数据传递到数据库之前对其进行舍入、截断或强制转换，请先使用 `System` 命名空间的一部分 类，然后再为参数的 `Value` 属性赋值。To round, truncate, or otherwise coerce data before passing it to the database, use the class that is part of the `System` namespace prior to assigning a value to the parameter's `Value` property. > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework 版本1.0 附带 .NET Framework 数据提供程序不验证 或 参数值。.NET Framework data providers that are included with the .NET Framework version 1.0 do not verify the or of parameter values. 这可能会导致在数据源中插入截断的数据。This can cause truncated data to be inserted at the data source. 如果使用 .NET Framework 版本1.0，请在设置参数值之前验证 值的 和 。If you are using .NET Framework version 1.0, validate the and of values before setting the parameter value. 超出 参数比例 值仍会被截断。 values that exceed the parameter scale are still truncated. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/VB/source.vb#4)]

public int Size { get; set; }
Public Property Size As Integer
public: property int Size { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置列中数据的最大大小（字节）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

value.span: 列中数据的最大大小（字节）。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

value.span: 默认值将根据参数值进行推断。

span.span: The default value is inferred from the parameter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值不受此属性影响;从存储过程返回参数总是固定大小的整数。Return values are not affected by this property; return parameters from stored procedures are always fixed-size integers. 对于带有可变长度类型（例如 nvarchar）的输出参数，参数的大小定义了包含 output 参数的缓冲区的大小。For output parameters with a variable length type (nvarchar, for example), the size of the parameter defines the size of the buffer holding the output parameter. 可以将 output 参数截断为 指定的大小。The output parameter can be truncated to a size specified with . 对于字符类型，用 指定的大小为字符。For character types, the size specified with is in characters. 属性用于二进制和字符串类型。The property is used for binary and string types. 对于类型 `SqlType.String`的参数，`Size` 表示 Unicode 字符的长度。For parameters of type `SqlType.String`, `Size` means length in Unicode characters. 对于 `SqlType.Xml`类型的参数，将忽略 `Size`。For parameters of type `SqlType.Xml`, `Size` is ignored. 对于非字符串数据类型和 ANSI 字符串数据， 属性是指字节数。For nonstring data types and ANSI string data, the property refers to the number of bytes. 对于 Unicode 字符串数据， 是指字符数。For Unicode string data, refers to the number of characters. 字符串的计数不包括终止字符。The count for strings does not include the terminating character. 对于可变长度数据类型， 描述要传输到服务器的最大数据量。For variable-length data types, describes the maximum amount of data to transmit to the server. 例如，对于 Unicode 字符串值，可以使用 将发送到服务器的数据量限制为前100个字符。For example, for a Unicode string value, could be used to limit the amount of data sent to the server to the first one hundred characters. 如果未显式设置，则会根据指定参数值的实际大小来推断大小。If not explicitly set, the size is inferred from the actual size of the specified parameter value. 如果参数值的小数部分大于大小，则该值将被截断以匹配大小。If the fractional part of the parameter value is greater than the size, then the value will be truncated to match the size. 对于固定长度数据类型，将忽略 的值。For fixed length data types, the value of is ignored. 可以检索它以提供信息，并返回将参数值传输到服务器时提供程序使用的最大字节数。It can be retrieved for informational purposes, and returns the maximum amount of bytes the provider uses when transmitting the value of the parameter to the server. 有关流式处理的信息，请参阅[SqlClient 流支持](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support)。For information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/VB/source.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置映射到 并且用于加载或返回 的源列的名称

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the source column mapped to the and used for loading or returning the

value.span: 映射到 的源列的名称。

span.span: The name of the source column mapped to the .
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 设置为空字符串以外的任何值，则将从具有 名称的列中检索参数的值。When is set to anything other than an empty string, the value of the parameter is retrieved from the column with the name. 如果 设置为 `Input`，则从 获取值。If is set to `Input`, the value is taken from the . 如果 设置为 `Output`，则从数据源获取值。If is set to `Output`, the value is taken from the data source. `InputOutput` 的 是两者的组合。A of `InputOutput` is a combination of both. 有关如何使用 属性的详细信息，请参阅[DataAdapter 参数](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters)和[使用 Dataadapter 更新数据源](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters)。For more information about how to use the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters) and [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/VB/source.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示源列是否可以为 null。

span.span: Gets or sets a value which indicates whether the source column is nullable.

summary.span: 通过此操作， 能够为可以为 null 的列正确地生成 Update 语句。

span.span: This allows to correctly generate Update statements for nullable columns.

value.span: 如果源列可以为 null，则为 ；如果不可以为 null，则为 。

span.span: if the source column is nullable; if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当处理可以为 null 的列时， 使用 来正确生成更新命令。 is used by the to correctly generate update commands when dealing with nullable columns. 通常，使用 仅限于从 继承的开发人员。Generally, use of is limited to developers inheriting from . 使用此属性来确定源列是否可以为 null，并将此属性设置为可以为 null 的情况下 `true` `false`，如果不是，则设置为。 uses this property to determine whether the source column is nullable, and sets this property to `true` if it is nullable, and `false` if it is not. 当 生成其 Update 语句时，它会检查每个参数的 。When is generating its Update statement, it examines the for each parameter. 如果该属性 `true`， 将生成如下 WHERE 子句（在此查询表达式中，"FieldName" 表示字段的名称）：If the property is `true`, generates a WHERE clauses like the following (in this query expression, "FieldName" represents the name of the field): ``` ((@IsNull_FieldName = 1 AND FieldName IS NULL) OR (FieldName = @Original_FieldName)) ``` 如果字段 为 false，则 生成以下 WHERE 子句：If for the field is false, generates the following WHERE clause: ``` FieldName = @OriginalFieldName ``` 此外，如果源字段包含 null，则 @IsNull_FieldName 包含1，如果不包含 null，则为0。In addition, @IsNull_FieldName contains 1 if the source field contains null, and 0 if it does not. 此机制允许在 SQL Server 中进行性能优化，并提供适用于跨多个提供程序的通用代码。This mechanism allows for a performance optimization in SQL Server, and provides for common code that works across multiple providers.

related.span: 使用 SQL Server 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序

span.span: Using the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性由 `SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand` 在更新过程中使用，以确定是否将原始值或当前值用于参数值。This property is used by the `SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand` during an update to determine whether the original or current value is used for a parameter value. 这将允许更新主键。This lets primary keys be updated. 此属性设置为 `DataRow.Item` 属性使用的 版本，或 对象的一个 `DataRow.GetChildRows` 方法。This property is set to the version of the used by the `DataRow.Item` property, or one of the `DataRow.GetChildRows` methods of the object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/VB/source.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置参数的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 已链接。The and are linked. 因此，设置 会将 更改为支持的 。Therefore, setting the changes the to a supporting . 有关支持的数据类型的列表，请参阅相应的 成员。For a list of the supported data types, see the appropriate member. 有关详细信息，请参阅[DataAdapter 参数](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters)。For more information, see [DataAdapter Parameters](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters). 有关流式处理的信息，请参阅[SqlClient 流支持](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support)。For information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support).

summary.span: 获取或设置作为 SQL 类型的参数的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the parameter as an SQL type.

value.span: 对象，是使用 SQL 类型的参数的值。

span.span: An that is the value of the parameter, using SQL types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于输入参数，值将绑定到发送到服务器的 。For input parameters, the value is bound to the that is sent to the server. 对于输出和返回值参数，值将在 完成时和 关闭后设置。For output and return value parameters, the value is set on completion of the and after the is closed. 此属性可以设置为 null 或 。This property can be set to null or . 使用 以参数值的形式发送 NULL 值。Use to send a NULL value as the value of the parameter. 使用 null 或不将 设置为使用参数的默认值。Use null or do not set to use the default value for the parameter. 如果应用程序指定了数据库类型，则当提供程序将数据发送到服务器时，绑定值将转换为该类型。If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server. 如果提供程序支持 接口，则会尝试转换任何类型的值。The provider tries to convert any type of value if it supports the interface. 如果指定的类型与值不兼容，则可能会导致转换错误。Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value. 和 属性都可以通过设置 进行推断。Both the and properties can be inferred by setting the . `SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand`将覆盖 属性。The property is overwritten by `SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand`. 使用 属性将参数值作为公共语言运行时（CLR）类型返回。Use the property to return parameter values as common language runtime (CLR) types. 有关流式处理的信息，请参阅[SqlClient 流支持](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support)。For information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support).

summary.span: 获取或设置参数的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.
An that is the value of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于输入参数，值将绑定到发送到服务器的 。For input parameters, the value is bound to the that is sent to the server. 对于输出和返回值参数，值将在 完成时和 关闭后设置。For output and return value parameters, the value is set on completion of the and after the is closed. 此属性可设置为 `null` 或 。This property can be set to `null` or . 使用 以参数值的形式发送 NULL 值。Use to send a NULL value as the value of the parameter. 使用 `null` 或不要将 设置为使用参数的默认值。Use `null` or do not set to use the default value for the parameter. 如果非 Unicode XML 数据作为字符串传递，则会引发异常。An exception is thrown if non-Unicode XML data is passed as a string. 如果应用程序指定了数据库类型，则当提供程序将数据发送到服务器时，绑定值将转换为该类型。If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server. 如果提供程序支持 接口，则会尝试转换任何类型的值。The provider tries to convert any type of value if it supports the interface. 如果指定的类型与值不兼容，则可能会导致转换错误。Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value. 和 属性都可以通过设置值进行推断。Both the and properties can be inferred by setting the Value. `SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand`将覆盖 属性。The property is overwritten by `SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand`. 有关流式处理的信息，请参阅[SqlClient 流支持](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support)。For information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/CS/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/VB/source.vb#8)]

summary.span: 获取此 XML 实例的架构集合所在的数据库的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the database where the schema collection for this XML instance is located.

value.span: 此 XML 实例的架构集合所在的数据库的名称。

span.span: The name of the database where the schema collection for this XML instance is located.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在当前数据库中定义了集合，则此值为 null （在 Microsoft Visual Basic 中为`Nothing`）。This value is null (`Nothing` in Microsoft Visual Basic) if the collection is defined within the current database. 如果没有架构集合，则此方法也为 null，在这种情况下 和 也为 null。It is also null if there is no schema collection, in which case and are also null.
